resources.string: Arya arrives in Braavos. Jamie takes on a secret mission. Ellaria Sand seeks revenge for Oberyns death. Stannis makes Jon a generous offer as the Nights Watch elects a new Lord Commander. Daenerys is faced with a difficult decision. Arya arrives in Braavos. Jamie takes on a secret mission.
